name: RoundPegg
description: RoundPegg is the only software that quantifies your Company Culture so you make smarter 'people' decisions. Understand your unique culture, make hires who are a great fit, give managers coaching guides for each of their reports & measure engagement.
one_liner: RoundPegg is the only software that quantifies your Company Culture so you make smarter 'people' decisions. Understand your unique culture, make hires who are a great fit, give managers coaching guides for each of their reports & measure engagement.
